response.raw:
Here is my response, formatted as requested:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>

# Supporting Training Materials and Technical Manuals Development

1. Conduct needs assessment
   - Identify target audience
   - Determine required knowledge and skills
   - Analyze existing materials

2. Outline content structure
   - Create logical flow of information
   - Break down into modules/chapters
   - Include learning objectives for each section

3. Develop content
   - Write clear, concise explanations
   - Use appropriate technical language
   - Incorporate visuals (diagrams, charts, screenshots)

4. Include practical examples and exercises
   - Provide real-world scenarios
   - Create hands-on activities
   - Design self-assessment questions

5. Implement multimedia elements
   - Add videos for complex procedures
   - Create interactive simulations
   - Develop audio narrations for accessibility

6. Ensure consistency and accuracy
   - Use style guides and templates
   - Conduct technical reviews
   - Proofread and edit thoroughly

7. Test materials
   - Pilot with sample audience
   - Gather feedback
   - Make necessary revisions

8. Prepare for distribution
   - Format for print and digital platforms
   - Create user-friendly navigation
   - Implement version control system

9. Plan for updates and maintenance
   - Schedule regular reviews
   - Establish update procedures
   - Create feedback mechanisms for users

</OUTPUT_TEXT>

# Supporting Training Materials and Technical Manuals Development

1. Conduct needs assessment
   - Identify target audience
   - Determine required knowledge and skills
   - Analyze existing materials

2. Outline content structure
   - Create logical flow of information

   - Include learning objectives for each section

3. Develop content

   - Provide real-world scenarios
   - Create hands-on activities
   - Design self-assessment questions
